title: Getting Started üöÄ
content:
Getting Started üöÄ

Welcome to the SolarWinds Qcells NMS Documentation!
This guide provides an overview of how to access and utilize the SolarWinds systems deployed at Qcells.

Please contact jinyoung.kim1@qcells.com to retrive your account information or generate new account.

üåê Accessing SolarWinds Qcells NMS

The SolarWinds Network Management System (NMS) for Qcells can be accessed via the following URL:

üîó SolarWinds Qcells NMS

This system allows you to: - Monitor and manage network infrastructure. - View performance metrics and real-time alerts. - Troubleshoot network issues with in-depth diagnostics.

üîπ Accessing SolarWinds Qcells DPA

The Database Performance Analyzer (DPA) can be accessed via the following URL:

üîó SolarWinds Qcells DPA

Features of DPA: - Analyze and optimize database performance. - Monitor slow queries and system load. - Improve overall database efficiency.

üõ† Next Steps

To get started with SolarWinds Qcells systems: 1. Ensure you have the appropriate access credentials. 2. Log in using the provided URLs. 3. Refer to the documentation for detailed monitoring and troubleshooting steps.

üîó Related Docs:

title: SolarWinds Windows Agent Installation
content:
SolarWinds Windows Agent Installation

Step 1: Open the Web Browser

  1. Go to SolarWinds Agent Download Page.
  2. When the login window appears, log in with the following credentials:
  3. Username: admin
  4. Password: qcell#12
  5. Click the Login button.

Step 2: Download and Install the Agent

  1. Select the Windows button and click the Next button.
  2. Choose Install Manually and click the Next button.
  3. Click the DOWNLOAD.MSI button, then click the Done button.
  4. Locate and open the SolarWinds-Agent.msi file.
  5. Click Next to begin the installation.
  6. Check the box to accept the License Agreement and click Next.
  7. Use the default installation path, then click Next.
  8. Click the Install button.
  9. When prompted, click Yes to confirm the installation.

Step 3: Configure the Agent

  1. Enter the following details when prompted:
  2. NMS Server IP Address: 10.204.42.7
  3. Orion Server Port: 17778
  4. Orion Username/ Password Obtain from the Admin.
  5. Click Yes to proceed with the installation.
  6. Once the installation is complete, click OK.

Step 4: Verify the Installation

  1. Access the Agent Management page:
    http://10.204.42.7/Orion/AgentManagement/Admin/ManageAgents.aspx.
  2. Enter the Credentials obtained
  3. If you see the newly installed agent in the list, the installation was successful.
